title: Unable to recover account
body: ask me questions and i will answer correct i own this acc 100% and for 5 months

replies.body: Our account team can assist with recovery, just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can review it with you directly.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
